data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Cabañas, El Salvador.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cabañas, El Salvador
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who are far from you in Cabañas. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Cabañas.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Cabañas, El Salvador.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Turk people.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Cabañas, El Salvador.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Cabañas, El Salvador.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary:
the state of Cabañas, El Salvador has a population of 164,900.

We estimate Cabañas has 74,100 people who might know Jesus, 81,656 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,144 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Cabañas that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.
